text: Lateness of Dancers is the fifth studio album by American band Hiss Golden Messenger. It was released on September 9, 2014 under Merge Records. ==Critical reception== Lateness of Dancers was met with universal acclaim reviews from critics. At Metacritic, which assigns a weighted average rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream publications, this release received an average score of 81, based on 16 reviews. ===Accolades=== {|class="wikitable sortable" |+Accolades for Lateness of Dancers |- ! Publication ! Accolade !
